title: Battlefront 2 vs. the Internet - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.13.17
description:
UPDATE!! EA is lowering the cost of  characters: https://www.ea.com/games/starwars/battlefront/battlefront-2/news/swbfii-changes-launch?utm_campaign=swbf2_hd_ww_ic_soco_twt_swbfii-launchchangesblog-tw&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&cid=41287&ts=1510608729384

Tim and Greg recap all the microtransaction happenings from the weekend.

00:00:30 - Housekeeping
Extra Life topped last year! Thanks, IP and OK Beast!
The Roper Report   -
00:03:35 - EA Chimes in on Battlefront II MicroTransactions and Internet explodes, via Reddit
00:26:00 - Xbox One X Overwatch Coming, via windows central
00:30:28 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:33:35 - November 13th is your 100th show! Congratulations - Kenny Belou
00:36:35 - What are your thoughts on games creating timed content that can be accessed only for a limited time? - DocDoomII
00:39:25 - What couldn't Lego worlds capture that makes Minecraft so great?  - themendoz
00:43:10 - The overall negativity regarding seemingly everything in the games industry - Drew
00:50:30 - Squad Up - Gus PS4:Razorblood09
00:51:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Andrea and Gary Whitta!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
